Description:
Detects command line activity that tries to clear or disable any ETW trace log which could be a sign of logging evasion.


Author: @neu5ron, Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ETW Trace Evasion Activity
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%set-etwtraceprovider%' and command like '%0x11%') or (command like '%cl%' and command like '%/trace%') or (command like '%clear-log%' and command like '%/trace%') or (command like '%sl%' and command like '%/e:false%') or (command like '%set-log%' and command like '%/e:false%') or (command like '%logman%' and command like '%update%' and command like '%trace%' and command like '%--p%' and command like '%-ets%') or command like '%remove-etwtraceprovider%')
